snippet: With the Human Brain Project, Henry Markram and his team in Lausanne, Switzerland, are trying to bring together scientists worldwide to create a “virtual copy of the human brain.”
abstract: Dr Henry Markram has set out to simulate entire human brain on supercomputer with Human Brain Project, sprawling and controversial initiative involving more than 150 institutions around world; project was awarded 10-year grant of up to $1.3 billion in January, but some scientists have expressed serious reservations about its viability.
lead_paragraph: With the Human Brain Project, Henry Markram and his team in Lausanne, Switzerland, are trying to bring together scientists worldwide to create a “virtual copy of the human brain.”

headline.seo: Bringing a Virtual Brain to Life
headline.main: Bringing a Virtual Brain to Life
headline.print_headline: Bringing a Virtual Brain to Life
